answers.answer: I did it and passed it... Barely. You have to get a value below 140, I got 137. My doc told me I could have breakfast, but 3 labs I called said no. I chose not to have breakfast and it worked for me. I'm pretty convinced I would have failed it if I had put extra sugar on my system that morning... If I were you, I'd fast. You don't want to risk having to take the 3 hour test. Good luck!
I did and I was told to fast, boo! I find out next week results. :)
I passed. I did fast..did it first thing in the morning.
I didn't fast and passed just fine. And mine was super low, under 110.
Had mine this morning after a small breakfast... Should hear the results tomorrow

I have done two, the 1 hr which I fasted for but was later told I should have eaten and I failed (blood sugar after 1 hr was 10.1, normal is 6.8-7.2) and I did the two hour yesterday and get my results this afternoon (had to fast for 12 hrs for this one after eating a high carb diet for 3 days prior)
I had breakfast and lunch before I went but obviously stayed away from anything super sugary and my sugar was 92.

Guess there really is no coralation then. Lol just depends on our bodies. I've actually already taken the test and passed, my office asked that we fast after midnight and offered a morning appointment. I just think its weird that some say to fast and others don't. So I was curious if one or the other had a higher failing rate.

I took it and almost passed out I couldn't hear of see anything after about 30 mins, but it went away finally and I haven't gotten a call back so hopefully that's a good thing. My last pregnancy I took it with no problems and passed.
Yes, its very hard to go without food while pregnant! I could feel my face getting really warm and flushed towards the end. Once I ate it seemed like the best food ever!!
I'm from Australia and here you don't have to fast for the hour test but you do have to fast for 8-12 hours, for the long test...ours is 2 hours though with 3 lots of blood being drawn
My doc dosnt have me fasting for the one hour at all just adviced me no super sugary things right before hand I have mine on Friday.. so I guess we will see if I pass or not
Has anyone else doc skipped hour test and did only the 3 hour one?? My doc didn't even give me the hour test choice... :/
No but they checked my blood sugar without the glucose with a blood drawl I had and said if it was high they would just skip the 1 hour & just go straight to the 3 hour.

In Australia you have to get the 2 hour test, and you have to fast for 12 hours. My doctor made me do it twice. I don't know why since my first one came back fine. I guess she just likes to cover her bases and double check everything is normal.

Well, I ate a Bojangles breakfast on my way to the doctor. When I got there, they decided to do the Glucose test because they needed some additional blood work anyway. So, I took the test and my results were 84.Surprised it was so low considering!
What's it mean when u fail? .....baby will be born big?

I go tomorrow for 1 hour but plan to fast.  Last pregnancy was told not to fast and failed then barely passed the 3 hour.  Going to fast this time and hopefully i pass this first time! I work full time and Have a toddler i dont have 3 hours to sit around!
Just got my result and I passed it, mine was 95. So happy  I was stressing out because all the failing that I am reading here.
So what's it mean to have gd? Will baby be big?

question: Who has taken the glucose test already? Did you pass or fail? I've seen a lot of fails and now they have to do the 3 hour test. Wondering if there is a coralation between if the doctor instructed you to fast or not, I know some do and some don't.
title: glucose test curiosity
